entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
